=======
CHANGES
=======

0.5.6 (2013-06-20)
------------------

- new translations

- removed locales for p01 packages with own locales e.g. p01.vocabulary.counter
  and p01.vocabulary.language

- switch to p01.recipe.setup i18n recipe since the z3c.recipe is broken


0.5.5 (2012-12-03)
------------------

- test release process

------------------

- test release process

------------------

- test release process

------------------

- test release process

- test release process

- initial release
